vibecodingwithwindsurf_beginnersguideton.human_name: Vibe Coding with Windsurf: Beginner's Guide to No-Code Web Design
vibecodingwithwindsurf_beginnersguideton.description_text: This course introduces you to no-code web development with Windsurf and Vibe coding, guiding you step-by-step to bring your website ideas to life. The early modules cover the basics of Vibe coding, familiarizing you with the interface, tools, and principles behind Windsurf. You'll set up your workspace, navigate key features, and create your first website, progressing from simple concepts to more complex functionality. As you advance, you'll apply your learning in a hands-on project, turning a concept into a fully functional website. Each stage focuses not only on technical web design skills but also on creative problem-solving for real-world challenges. The course emphasizes the importance of publishing your website with Vercel, allowing you to easily launch and manage your site online. The final section delves into more advanced topics, like AI tools such as Claude, GPT, and Gemini, exploring their role in web design and development. You’ll also get tips on troubleshooting bugs, making live website adjustments, and enhancing the user experience. By the course’s end, you’ll be equipped with the knowledge to confidently create and maintain websites—all without writing any code.

frombase44designtoswiftui_buildingiosapp.human_name: From Base44 Design to SwiftUI - Building iOS Apps with Ease
frombase44designtoswiftui_buildingiosapp.description_text: This course is designed for anyone who wants to explore iOS development in a fun and creative way. Starting with Base44, a free no-code platform, you'll quickly learn to prototype your app ideas without writing a single line of code. This approach helps you experiment, play, and learn by doing, making it ideal for beginners. As the course progresses, you’ll transition into SwiftUI, where you’ll learn how to write clean, idiomatic SwiftUI code, manage app state, and handle persistent data with SwiftData. You’ll gain hands-on experience with key concepts like user interface design, app logic, and data management, which are essential for building professional-level iOS apps. You’ll work on real-world projects, starting with a Todo app and expanding into other projects that reinforce your understanding. By the end of the course, you’ll have the confidence to create fully functional iOS apps and add them to your portfolio, ready for deployment on the App Store. Throughout the course, Dr. Ron Erez will be available to guide you, ensuring a smooth learning experience with plenty of opportunities for feedback and improvement.

harnessingopensourcellmsandchatgptwithmi.human_name: Harnessing Open Source LLMs and ChatGPT with Minimal Code
harnessingopensourcellmsandchatgptwithmi.description_text: Welcome to the captivating world of Large Language Models (LLMs)! This course is designed to guide you through the fascinating landscape of LLMs, encompassing both no-code and low-code solutions powered by Python. We begin by equipping you with the necessary software to operate these models locally, enabling you to explore various open-source models, including Google’s Gemma:7b and Llama3, without the need for an internet connection. In the advanced section, you will delve into using Python for streaming responses from open-source LLMs and integrating with the official OpenAI API. The course covers low code solutions for streaming ChatGPT responses and introduces function calling within ChatGPT models. You'll also learn about the llama3 model and how to interface it with Python for web applications. Throughout the course, you'll gain experience fetching responses in both batch and streaming modes, and we will jointly develop a small web frontend using Streamlit for our streaming LLM API. By the end of the course, you'll be equipped to run open-source LLMs locally and leverage their capabilities to the fullest.

frombase44tojetpackcompose_buildingandro.human_name: From Base44 to Jetpack Compose - Building Android Apps with Ease
frombase44tojetpackcompose_buildingandro.description_text: This course introduces you to the world of Android app development in a fun and accessible way. Starting with Base44, you'll quickly prototype app ideas and experiment with different solutions. By using ChatGPT prompts and understanding how to streamline app creation, you’ll develop a foundation for building functional apps in no time. As you progress, you'll dive into Kotlin programming fundamentals, mastering variables, loops, conditionals, and more. These essential skills will set the stage for the development of modern Android applications. Next, you'll explore Jetpack Compose for creating dynamic UIs, handling state, and implementing animations to build visually appealing and interactive apps. The course culminates with a hands-on project where you’ll transform a Base44 prototype into a fully functioning Flashcards app. You’ll gain experience with state management, data storage using Room Database, and Android performance optimization. The final stages will prepare you to test, refine, and publish your app to the Google Play Store, setting you up for success as a beginner Android developer.

masterlangchainwithno-codetools_flowisea.human_name: Master LangChain with No-Code tools - Flowise and LangFlow
masterlangchainwithno-codetools_flowisea.description_text: Dive into the dynamic world of LangChain and discover how to use it to create AI-driven workflows, applications, and tools. This course starts by introducing you to the core concepts of LangChain and why it’s an essential tool for modern AI development. You’ll begin with the installation and configuration of Flowise and LangFlow, two critical UI tools that simplify LangChain’s capabilities. Once set up, you'll move on to creating various types of prompt templates and AI chains, learning how to apply them in real-world scenarios. The course then delves deeper into advanced functionalities, including memory systems and summarization use cases, crucial for building dynamic and responsive AI systems. Along the way, you’ll explore the fascinating world of agents, learning how to build and deploy them to automate tasks within LangChain. Finally, you’ll gain insights into integrating LangChain with external no-code platforms like Bubble, allowing for seamless app creation without needing extensive coding expertise. By the end of this course, you'll have a thorough understanding of how to use LangChain, Flowise, and LangFlow to create, deploy, and scale powerful AI applications and workflows.

developers.developer-name: Menlo Park Lab Corp CEO Syed Misbahuddin

codethefutureai-poweredappbuildingwithno.human_name: Code the Future AI-Powered App Building with No-Code & Full Stack Tools
codethefutureai-poweredappbuildingwithno.description_text: In this course, you will embark on an exciting journey to build AI-powered full-stack applications. Starting with foundational concepts of AI workflows, you’ll learn to use OpenAI and n8n to create seamless data pipelines and automate processes. By diving into vector databases with Supabase, you’ll understand how to manage and query data effectively. The course also covers setting up user authentication and creating dynamic chat interfaces, while leveraging webhooks and APIs to integrate different tools into your app. As you progress, you’ll develop a fully-functioning app that includes real-time chat and semantic search capabilities. You’ll be guided step-by-step to set up Supabase for chat memory and metadata storage, creating the ideal environment for interacting with data in real-time. The course culminates with integrating payment systems using Stripe, allowing you to implement a free/pro user tier and monetize your app. Throughout the course, you will gain the knowledge and experience to turn an idea into a fully deployed, production-ready AI-powered application. From the basics of setting up workflows to advanced deployment techniques, you will master the full development cycle. By the end, you’ll have a fully functional AI app with a user interface, data storage, and payment integration.

githubcopilotandchatgptfordevs_codesmart.human_name: GitHub Copilot & ChatGPT for Devs - Code Smarter in 2024
githubcopilotandchatgptfordevs_codesmart.description_text: This course offers an in-depth exploration of GitHub Copilot and ChatGPT, two cutting-edge tools revolutionizing the coding landscape. Starting with a comprehensive introduction, you'll set up your development environment, including GitHub and OpenAI accounts and VSCode installation. From there, you’ll delve into ChatGPT, understanding its learning process, crafting ideal prompts, and exploring various use cases such as research, code generation, and explanation. A dedicated section compares free alternatives like Google Gemini, providing a well-rounded perspective on AI assistants. As the course progresses, you'll be introduced to GitHub Copilot, its setup, and functionality. Detailed sections cover prompting techniques, both by writing and using comments, enhancing your ability to communicate with these tools effectively. Practical exercises, like generating a Tic-Tac-Toe game, solidify your understanding and application of the concepts. The course culminates with advanced topics, agents, tips, and a premium ChatGPT workshop, ensuring you are well-equipped to integrate these AI tools into your development practice seamlessly.

bubbleno-codemasterclass_tradingbotbuild.human_name: Bubble No-Code MasterClass: Trading Bot Building Project
bubbleno-codemasterclass_tradingbotbuild.description_text: This course takes you on an exciting journey through the world of no-code development, focusing on creating a trading bot with Bubble. Starting with an introduction to the platform, you will gain a solid understanding of Bubble’s core features, including how to structure your app’s frontend, backend, and workflows. Each section is designed to guide you through essential no-code skills, from database management to responsive app design. You will learn how to integrate financial data, set up technical indicators, and even implement complex algorithms like linear regression. The course breaks down complex trading concepts into digestible lessons, providing you with practical skills for building a sophisticated trading bot. By the end of the course, you’ll have hands-on experience in automating trading strategies and using data-driven decisions to optimize your bot’s performance. Through carefully structured lessons, you’ll work on everything from user management and authentication to visualizing financial data on dynamic charts. The course also dives deep into back-end automation and looping logic to ensure your bot runs seamlessly. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned professional, this course equips you with the tools to design, develop, and deploy a trading bot entirely without writing a single line of code.

buildon.description_text:
Donations to support buildOn are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

buildOn’s mission is to break the cycle of poverty, illiteracy, and low expectations through service and education. They mobilize U.S. students to transform their communities through service and change the world by building schools in developing countries.

creategenai-poweredapps_allwithno-code.human_name: Create Gen AI-Powered Apps - All with No-Code
creategenai-poweredapps_allwithno-code.description_text: This course is designed to empower you with the ability to create cutting-edge AI-powered applications using a variety of no-code tools. Starting with an overview of essential no-code platforms such as Bubble, Power Apps, and BuildShip, you'll gain a solid understanding of the tools at your disposal. The course then delves into the practical aspects of building generative AI applications, guiding you step-by-step through the creation of sophisticated chatbots, from a basic PDF-based Q&A bot to a full conversational assistant integrated with Microsoft Teams. As you progress, you'll explore advanced AI applications like a receipt chatbot and a data assistant, learning how to harness the power of OpenAI’s API, GPT-4 Vision, and other AI technologies. Each module is structured to provide hands-on experience, ensuring that you can apply what you learn to real-world scenarios. By the end of the course, you’ll not only have built multiple AI-driven applications but also acquired the confidence and knowledge to innovate independently. This course is perfect for professionals and enthusiasts looking to leverage the latest in AI technology without the need for programming skills. Whether you're in tech, business, or a creative field, you'll find the skills taught here invaluable for staying ahead in a rapidly evolving digital landscape.

vibecodingbootcamp.description_text: This course offers a fast-paced journey into AI-powered development by guiding learners through modern tools and workflows that bring intelligent applications to life. Starting with intuitive platforms like Bolt.new and Replit, learners are introduced to full-stack application building using prompts, AI generation, and rapid deployment. The initial modules focus on building foundational understanding through structured hands-on experiences. As learners advance, they explore how to convert static content into dynamic services by integrating image and text-generation APIs, chat interfaces, and databases. The course emphasizes connecting back-end logic with front-end functionality using scalable architectures. It delves into API handling, data management, and real-time interaction designs, setting the stage for robust web application development. The final modules provide end-to-end development experience with tools like Cursor, Windsurf, Clerk, and Supabase. Learners implement full authentication flows, user billing, and version control strategies, culminating in a capstone project that demands ideation, MVP development, AI feature integration, and deployment readiness. Bonus content extends this journey with full-stack builds to cement the skills acquired.

developers.developer-name: Menlo Park Lab Corp CEO Syed Misbahuddin

makeappswithchatgptandgenerativeai.human_name: Make Apps with ChatGPT and Generative AI
makeappswithchatgptandgenerativeai.description_text: ChatGPT is a language generation model developed by OpenAI. Its newest form, Davinci, is behind the ChatGPT program we all know. It grew popular in December 2022 after people started using it and seeing how amazingly it deals with prompt-response completion questions. This course’s objective is to build applications and solutions with ChatGPT. You will do that by learning more about OpenAI and ChatGPT and how to use their APIs in your platforms. You will create a serverless function that can take ChatGPT prompts and return responses—the first step to integrate your ChatGPT into your app. You will learn to incorporate the ChatGPT API into many platforms. Connect to OpenAI API and create Azure functions that leverage ChatGPT. Finally, you will develop complete applications and solution examples, including CoverLetterCreator, StockPhotoPPT, PolitelySayNo, and TravelPlan. Upon completion, you will use ChatGPT to increase your productivity and build real-life solutions and applications from scratch using ChatGPT. You will leverage this unique AI model with other OpenAI models such as DALL-E to create business software independently. You will integrate the API into different platforms, including Outlook, Power Apps, Power Automate, Airtable, and Bubble, and build real-life applications and solutions from scratch. All resources are available at: https://github.com/PacktPublishing/Make-Apps-with-ChatGPT-and-Generative-AI

no-codeaiagentsforsocialmedia_astep-by-s.human_name: No-Code AI Agents for Social Media - A Step-by-Step Guide
no-codeaiagentsforsocialmedia_astep-by-s.description_text: In today’s digital world, automation is essential for a strong social media presence. This course offers a comprehensive guide to building no-code AI agents that transform your online strategy. You’ll begin by understanding the core principles of AI agents and their seamless integration across platforms. The hands-on approach will take you through every stage, from designing your AI agent’s brain to optimizing its functions for efficient social media management. Next, the course introduces Make.com, a powerful automation platform, where you’ll learn to create dynamic workflows and scenarios. By combining AI agents with Make.com’s toolkit, you’ll automate tasks without writing code. As you progress, you’ll gain practical skills in prompt engineering and building systems for platforms like LinkedIn and X (formerly Twitter). You’ll learn to create agents that research, post, and manage social media engagement at scale. By the end of the course, you’ll be ready to build a network of AI agents tailored to your business. Whether for lead generation, content creation, or social media scaling, you’ll have the tools to automate tasks and boost productivity. The course also covers testing and platform authorization to integrate social media into your automation pipeline.

dify_createno-codechatbotsandaiworkflows.human_name: Dify - Create No-Code Chatbots and AI Workflows
dify_createno-codechatbotsandaiworkflows.description_text: Unlock the potential of AI without coding with Dify, a no-code platform that enables you to build chat applications and automation workflows. This course starts by guiding you through the Dify setup, where you’ll learn to configure models and understand the platform’s cloud and community editions. Whether you're a business professional or AI enthusiast, you'll master the fundamentals of creating intelligent applications. As the course progresses, you’ll dive into building sophisticated chat applications using variables, vision capabilities, and agent-based models. You’ll also explore how to develop text generation applications and dynamic workflows to automate business tasks. Practical workshops allow you to apply your skills, such as building an article reader and integrating file uploads into your AI models. In the final sections, the focus shifts to deploying your Dify applications and integrating knowledge bases for enhanced accuracy. You'll learn how to manage logs, annotations, and monitor performance to ensure your AI solutions run smoothly. This course prepares you for real-world deployment, equipping you to use Dify effectively in any business setting.

googleappsheetmasterclass_buildpowerfula.human_name: Google AppSheet Masterclass - Build Powerful Apps and Automations
googleappsheetmasterclass_buildpowerfula.description_text: Learn to harness the full capabilities of Google AppSheet to design, develop, and deploy robust apps—no coding required. The course begins with a structured introduction to the AppSheet platform, its key components, and a guided roadmap to help you navigate your learning efficiently. From understanding the environment to best practices for skill development, the early modules provide a strong technical foundation. As you progress, you'll master essential AppSheet building blocks like data modeling, views, styling, user actions, and automations. Each feature is introduced in context, with clear, actionable steps that promote both understanding and application. Key skills include creating virtual columns, using format rules, designing dashboards, and implementing automation workflows with conditions. Toward the end, you'll enhance app security through user-based filters and permission settings, preparing your apps for real-world deployment. The course concludes with a strategic overview of how to evolve and scale your projects. Whether you're aiming to improve team operations, streamline business processes, or build tools for clients, this course equips you to turn concepts into functional, secure, and scalable apps with confidence.

copilotinmicrosoft365forbeginners.description_text: This course introduces Microsoft Copilot, an AI assistant designed to enhance productivity across Microsoft 365 apps. You’ll learn about the differences between Copilot Pro and Copilot for Microsoft 365 and gain access to helpful resources like the Adoption Center Library. The course covers Copilot's core functions and how it improves the Microsoft 365 experience. You will explore Copilot's functionality in Excel, where you'll automate tasks like formatting, formula creation, and data analysis with pivot tables. In PowerPoint, you’ll learn to create and modify presentations, use company-branded templates, and streamline the process using Copilot. The course also covers Copilot's capabilities in Word for drafting, editing, summarizing, and refining documents. Additionally, you'll discover how Copilot enhances communication and collaboration. In Outlook, Copilot helps draft emails, summarize replies, and improve your writing. The final sections focus on Microsoft Teams, OneNote, Loop, and Bing. Each section includes practical exercises to help you implement Copilot in your daily work and optimize productivity and collaboration.

ai-enhancedscrummaster_automateanalysean.human_name: The AI-Enhanced Scrum Master - Automate, Analyse, and Accelerate Agile Workflow
ai-enhancedscrummaster_automateanalysean.description_text:
This course is designed for Scrum Masters and Agile practitioners eager to embrace the power of Generative AI to supercharge their workflows. This course covers everything from automating backlog creation, user story generation, and sprint planning to enhancing Scrum ceremonies like daily standups.

You’ll start by learning the fundamentals of Generative AI, including tools like ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini, and how to apply them in an Agile context. With practical examples, you’ll explore prompt engineering, AI-driven prioritization, and how to integrate AI tools within Jira and other popular platforms.

Key highlights include automating user story creation, generating acceptance criteria, and using AI for sprint tracking with burndown charts and dashboards. You’ll also learn ethical considerations around AI adoption and how to drive AI acceptance within your teams. By the end of the course, you'll be equipped to leverage AI for improved decision-making, team collaboration, and overall Agile success.

productanalyticsessentials_abeginnersgui.human_name: Product Analytics Essentials - A Beginner's Guide to Product Management

publishers.publisher-url: https://www.packtpub.com/product/product analytics essentials - a beginner’s guide to product management/9781806385232

productanalyticsessentials_abeginnersgui.description_text:
In this beginner’s course, you’ll explore the fundamentals of product analytics and how to apply them in product management. Starting with key concepts, you'll learn how analytics help measure user behavior and guide critical product decisions. The course provides hands-on exercises and real-world examples, helping you define and refine your product’s value proposition, identify key value moments, and create impactful user experiences that improve satisfaction and retention.

You’ll gain insight into key performance metrics like active user engagement, retention, and drop-off rates, empowering you to track product success and identify areas for improvement. Through segmentation strategies, you’ll learn to understand different user groups, making your product decisions more targeted and effective. This course also covers how to identify power users and design data-driven user personas that shape your product’s development.

By the end of the course, you'll be equipped to use data-driven techniques to optimize product design, from defining metrics to implementing A/B testing for continuous product improvements. Whether you're starting in product management or aiming to enhance your skills, this course lays the groundwork for making informed, data-driven decisions that will elevate your product strategy.

developers.developer-url: https://www.packtpub.com/product/product analytics essentials - a beginner’s guide to product management/9781806385232

pmpmastery_thecompletepathtoprojectmanag.human_name: PMP Mastery - The Complete Path to Project Management Success
pmpmastery_thecompletepathtoprojectmanag.description_text:
In PMP® Mastery - The Complete Path to Project Management Success, you’ll gain a deep understanding of key project management principles, processes, and tools required to pass the PMP® exam. This course covers everything from foundational project management concepts to advanced techniques.

Start by learning the evolution of project management, the importance of the PMP® certification, and insights into the exam structure. You'll explore topics such as project life cycle, ITTOs, knowledge areas, performance domains, and the latest PMBoK® 7 updates.

Learn to navigate complex project processes including scope, schedule, cost, and quality management. Develop skills in risk management, stakeholder engagement, resource allocation, and procurement management. The course includes practical quizzes, interactive content, and case studies to reinforce your learning.

By the end of this course, you'll be equipped to take on any project, manage diverse teams, and drive project success. Whether you’re new to project management or preparing for the PMP® exam, this course will guide you every step of the way toward your certification goal.

agileproductownerlevel2_comprehensivecer.human_name: Agile Product Owner Level 2 - Comprehensive Certification Guide and Mock Exams
agileproductownerlevel2_comprehensivecer.description_text:
Unlock the next level in your Agile journey with this advanced Product Owner training. Starting with a recap of fundamental Scrum principles, the course dives deep into essential topics such as empiricism, product vision, and organizational design. You'll explore advanced concepts like budgeting, release planning, and key metrics like Time to Market (T2M) and Current Value (CV), ensuring you’re equipped with the tools to deliver maximum value to stakeholders.

The curriculum is thoughtfully structured to guide you through the nuances of managing product backlogs, stakeholder relationships, and release planning. Interactive videos and real-world scenarios help clarify complex topics such as agile-compatible contracts and cross-functional team dynamics. Special sections on mock exams and certification tips provide a focused pathway to acing the PSPO II® exam.

Whether you're fine-tuning your understanding of Scrum artifacts or learning to navigate challenging stakeholder scenarios, this course provides the expertise and confidence to succeed as a Product Owner. By the end of this course, you'll not only be prepared to pass the PSPO II® exam but also to drive innovation and value within your Agile teams.

expertleadershipandmanagementinagileproj.human_name: Expert Leadership and Management in Agile Project Management: Building Core Competencies
expertleadershipandmanagementinagileproj.description_text:
Discover the transformative power of Agile methodology in this extensive course designed for technical professionals. Beginning with an in-depth look at the history and evolution of Agile, you'll gain a solid understanding of its foundational principles and values. You'll trace the journey from traditional Waterfall methods to Agile, comprehending the reasons behind the shift and the benefits it brings to project management.

As you progress, the course delves into the core concepts and working models of Agile, providing clarity on when and how to apply Agile practices effectively. You'll learn why Agile development consistently delivers better software outcomes and explore its potential future in the ever-evolving digital business landscape. Practical exercises, such as reflecting on Waterfall vs. Agile, ensure you can apply theoretical knowledge to real-world scenarios.

Furthermore, the course examines Agile project management's adaptability, helping you recognize the situations where Agile can be most beneficial. By the end, you'll have a comprehensive understanding of Agile and its application, preparing you to implement Agile practices confidently in your projects.

agileproductownerlevel1_certificationpre.human_name: Agile Product Owner Level 1 - Certification prep with Mock Exams
agileproductownerlevel1_certificationpre.description_text:
Embark on a transformative journey through Agile and Scrum methodologies with this expertly designed course. You'll start with an introduction to Agile principles, Scrum history, and the essential values that drive successful product ownership and team collaboration. Engaging videos and exercises ensure you grasp the fundamentals while providing insights into real-world applications.

Delve deeper into Scrum roles, events, and artifacts, emphasizing their importance in creating efficient workflows and delivering maximum value. Explore how artificial intelligence revolutionizes product ownership by providing actionable insights, streamlining automation, and crafting innovative solutions. Hands-on demonstrations with Jira and Trello will elevate your skills in managing backlogs, planning sprints, and refining workflows effectively.

Finally, put your knowledge to the test with certification prep for PSPO I® and PSM I®, featuring mock exams, practical tools, and expert tips to ensure you're exam-ready. The course equips you with the skills to lead Agile transformations and empowers you to implement Scrum practices seamlessly in your organization.

microsoftexcel2021and365_beginnertoadvan.description_text:
Excel has become an indispensable tool for professionals across industries, enabling efficient data organization, analysis, and presentation. This course begins by guiding learners through the foundations of Excel 365, introducing navigation, workbook creation, and formatting essentials. With exercises built into each section, students gain practical experience while mastering key skills like data entry, number formatting, and basic formulas.

As the journey progresses, the course dives deeper into intermediate-level concepts, helping learners create well-structured spreadsheets that are both functional and professional. Advanced formula techniques, data validation, and powerful features such as Lookup functions, PivotTables, and chart creation are explained in detail, offering learners the ability to analyze and present data effectively

The advanced modules introduce learners to work with Power Query and Power Pivot, design custom formulas with LAMBDA, and explore AI-powered features like Microsoft Copilot and ChatGPT integration. From macros and VBA automation to dynamic arrays and interactive dashboards, the course prepares you to solve complex problems efficiently. By the end, learners will be equipped with the knowledge to use Excel not just as a spreadsheet tool but as a strategic asset in decision-making and productivity.

machinelearningproductmanagement_strateg.human_name: Machine Learning Product Management - Strategy to Deployment
machinelearningproductmanagement_strateg.description_text:
This course immerses you in the field of machine learning product management. You’ll start by exploring fundamental ML concepts, key terminology, and the differences between supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning. Practical exercises will help reinforce your understanding and give you the confidence to classify different ML types and understand how algorithms learn from data.

As you progress, you’ll learn to assess whether machine learning is the right tool for specific problems, consider the AI flywheel, and avoid common pitfalls in ML development. You’ll gain skills in evaluating data requirements and making decisions on model interpretability, ensuring the best approach for your ML project. By the end of this section, you’ll know when and how to integrate machine learning effectively into your product.

The course concludes with guidance on managing ML projects, data acquisition, preprocessing techniques, and selecting the right algorithms. You’ll gain hands-on experience in developing real-world ML solutions, from regression models to clustering algorithms. Finally, you’ll learn how to optimize model performance, evaluate using metrics like precision and recall, and deploy with confidence, preparing you to manage and deploy ML-driven products across industries.

agilereleasemanagementforscrumandkanbant.human_name: Agile Release Management for Scrum and Kanban Teams

publishers.publisher-url: https://www.packtpub.com/product/agile release management for scrum and kanban teams/9781806381913

agilereleasemanagementforscrumandkanbant.description_text:
In the fast-paced world of agile development, mastering release management is key to delivering value predictably and at scale. This course takes you through the complete agile release lifecycle for Scrum and Kanban teams. You’ll begin with core concepts such as defining your product vision, creating a product roadmap, and understanding your current release state. Through hands-on exercises, you’ll apply these concepts to your own product context, ensuring a personalized learning experience.

As you move through the course, you’ll dive deeper into effective release planning, learning how to balance time, scope, and resources to meet deadlines. You'll explore the art of defining MVPs and MVFs, along with crafting both fixed-date and fixed-scope release plans. With a strong foundation in release strategies, you’ll then examine the essential infrastructure—continuous integration (CI), continuous delivery (CD), deployment pipelines, and testing strategies that ensure smooth releases.

Finally, the course prepares you to scale agile releases across teams and organizations using frameworks like SAFe, LeSS, and Nexus. Whether managing single-team sprints or coordinating enterprise-wide releases, this course equips you with the tools and knowledge to lead successful agile releases at any scale.

developers.developer-url: https://www.packtpub.com/product/agile release management for scrum and kanban teams/9781806381913

powerpointexcellence_advanceddesignandan.human_name: PowerPoint Excellence - Advanced Design & Animation for Elite Presentations
powerpointexcellence_advanceddesignandan.description_text:
In this course, you'll explore advanced PowerPoint techniques to elevate your presentation skills to an elite level. Starting with foundational slide design, you’ll master text animations, motion paths, and custom transitions, allowing for more dynamic and impactful presentations. Through step-by-step instructions, you'll learn to manipulate shapes, images, and text to craft stunning designs.

As you progress, you’ll dive deeper into 3D movement, picture animations, and personalized data visualizations. You'll also master the Morph feature for seamless slide transitions, along with techniques to make charts, graphs, and images not just informative, but visually striking. With hands-on projects and real-world examples, you’ll create elite presentations that engage audiences through motion, interactivity, and professional layouts.

By the end of the course, you’ll confidently apply PowerPoint’s advanced features in any professional setting. Whether you’re working on a business pitch, corporate presentation, or creative portfolio, the skills learned will ensure your presentations stand out with polished, high-impact visuals that captivate and impress.

agilescrummasterlevelii_certificationpre.human_name: Agile Scrum Master Level II - Certification Prep with Mock Exams
agilescrummasterlevelii_certificationpre.description_text:
Dive into the core principles of Scrum, exploring empiricism, Scrum values, and the intricacies of self-management. You’ll learn how to navigate the dynamics of Scrum teams, handle challenging stakeholder interactions, and foster collaboration across scaled teams. Each module features practical scenarios, quizzes, and actionable strategies to solidify your understanding.

The course doesn’t just focus on theory—it’s a hands-on learning experience. Delve into the nuances of Scrum events, artifacts, and the all-important Definition of Done, ensuring you have a holistic grasp of every Scrum facet. Discover how to mitigate risks, tackle technical debt, and build resilient teams. Practical tips for exam preparation and mock tests are woven throughout to help you succeed on your first attempt at the PSM II® certification.

By the end of this course, you’ll be equipped with the skills to lead Agile transformations confidently. With insights into leadership, organizational culture, and facilitation, this course ensures you’re not just exam-ready but also prepared to elevate your professional impact as a Scrum Master.

scrumrepairguide_getagileteamsbackontrac.human_name: The Scrum Repair Guide - Get Agile Teams Back on Track

publishers.publisher-url: https://www.packtpub.com/product/the scrum repair guide - get agile teams back on track/9781806382651

scrumrepairguide_getagileteamsbackontrac.description_text:
Agile success isn’t about rigidly following best practices—it’s about evolving your Scrum team in a way that fits your organization’s goals, structure, and people. This course begins by guiding you through a self-assessment to uncover why your team may be struggling, from misaligned goals to over-management and low morale. It identifies the common traps that teams fall into and explains how to correct them without abandoning the core framework of Scrum.

You’ll move through real-world problem-solving sessions, combining strategic insights with hands-on exercises. You'll revisit Scrum’s foundational values and learn how to operationalize them in retrospectives and decision-making. You’ll fix your Product Backlog, restructure roles like the Product Owner, and uncover the real cause behind team stagnation. Developers, managers, and product leads will benefit from actionable strategies to rebuild accountability, collaboration, and clarity across the entire Scrum cycle.

By the end of the course, you won’t just have a better understanding of Scrum—you’ll have a customized toolkit to repair dysfunctions, align stakeholders, and empower your team to deliver high-value results sprint after sprint. Whether you’re rebooting a struggling team or proactively optimizing performance, this guide is your blueprint to long-term agility.

developers.developer-url: https://www.packtpub.com/product/the scrum repair guide - get agile teams back on track/9781806382651

completeproductmanagementfundamentalscou.description_text:
Welcome to our comprehensive course, where we unravel the multifaceted world of product management. This course is your gateway to mastering the intricacies of product development, Agile methodologies, and essential project management tools.

We begin by exploring the fundamentals of product management, dissecting the core concepts of products and the pivotal role of a product manager. We demystify the realm of Agile methodologies, unraveling its history, diverse methodologies such as Scrum and Lean, and the principles that bind them together. Gain practical insights into Agile roles, concepts, artifacts, and rituals, empowering you to navigate the dynamic landscape of modern project management.

A significant portion of our course is dedicated to hands-on experience with pivotal project management tools. Dive into Trello, Jira, Microsoft Teams, and Planner, and harness the power of ChatGPT for seamless collaboration, task management, and AI-driven productivity. Acquire the skills to set up boards, manage tasks, conduct real-time meetings, and generate insightful reports, transforming your approach to project execution.

By the end of this course, you will be equipped with a profound understanding of product management fundamentals, agile methodologies, and the practical expertise to wield essential project management tools effectively.

changemanagementcrashcourse_changemanage.human_name: Change Management Crash Course: Change Management 101
changemanagementcrashcourse_changemanage.description_text:
In this course, you'll start with the basics of change management, understanding its importance and the pivotal role of a change manager. The initial section introduces you to fundamental concepts, setting a strong foundation for your learning journey. Videos cover what change management is and why it is crucial in today's dynamic business environment.

Moving forward, the course delves into the principles and processes that underpin effective change management. You'll learn about the key principles that guide successful change initiatives and explore a step-by-step process for managing change within an organization. These insights will help you develop a structured approach to navigate and implement change effectively.

Finally, the course provides valuable insights and practical tips for successful change management. You'll gain actionable takeaways and strategies to apply in real-world scenarios, ensuring you can lead change initiatives with confidence and efficiency. By the end of the course, you'll be equipped with the knowledge and tools to drive positive transformations in any organizational setting.

masteragileestimation_toptechniquesforsc.human_name: Master Agile Estimation - Top Techniques for Scrum and Kanban
masteragileestimation_toptechniquesforsc.description_text:
In this comprehensive course, Master Agile Estimation - Top Techniques for Scrum and Kanban, you will dive deep into essential estimation methods used in Agile environments. Starting with the basics of estimation, you'll explore core techniques like Planning Poker, Story Points, T-shirt Sizing, Bucket System, and Three-point Method. The course provides a solid foundation in estimation best practices, with interactive exercises to help you apply these techniques effectively within your teams.

You'll also gain insights into advanced topics, such as velocity-driven vs. commitment-driven planning, calculating team velocity, and using reference stories for enhanced accuracy. Troubleshooting common estimation challenges like multi-tasking, unstable teams, and ignoring uncertainties will also be covered.

By the end of the course, you will be well-equipped to lead estimation sessions confidently, optimize team performance, and contribute to the success of Agile projects. This course is ideal for Scrum Masters, Agile Coaches, Product Owners, or anyone involved in Agile planning.

capmcompleteexamtraining_certifiedassoci.human_name: CAPM Complete Exam Training - Certified Associate in Project Management
capmcompleteexamtraining_certifiedassoci.description_text:
This course is your complete guide to passing the CAPM exam. You'll start by understanding key project management concepts, such as project governance, stakeholder roles, and the differences between projects and operations. The course dives deep into the latest PMBOK 7 principles, helping you master essential project management domains like risk, quality, communication, and resource management.

You'll also explore Agile and hybrid environments, learning how to apply frameworks like Scrum, and how to tailor your approach for different project needs. With hands-on exercises, real-world examples, and practice exams, you’ll gain a thorough understanding of the core areas of the CAPM exam.

By the end of the course, you'll have the knowledge and skills to confidently sit for the CAPM exam and the practical experience to excel in project management roles. Whether you're preparing for the exam or looking to advance your project management career, this course will provide you with the foundation for success.

masteringagilescrum_frombasicstoadvanced.human_name: Mastering Agile Scrum - From Basics to Advanced with Jira Projects
masteringagilescrum_frombasicstoadvanced.description_text:
In today’s fast-paced digital world, mastering Agile and Scrum is vital for effective project management. This course introduces the Scrum framework, its core values, and principles, exploring how Agile overcomes common challenges like poor coordination and inefficient planning.

You’ll learn about the roles of the Scrum Master, Product Owner, and Development Team, and gain hands-on experience with creating user stories, estimating workloads, and defining the “Definition of Done.” The course covers managing product and sprint backlogs, conducting sprints, and using tools like burndown charts to track progress. You’ll also gain experience with Jira, setting up boards, epics, and tracking sprint performance.

By the end, you’ll understand how to scale Scrum across multiple teams, facilitate Scrum ceremonies, and compare frameworks like SAFe and DAD. This course will help you lead Agile transformations, refine backlogs iteratively, and improve delivery and innovation for better project outcomes.

Perfect for team leaders, developers, and project managers.

bcrf.description_text:
Donations to support BCRF are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The mission of the Breast Cancer Research Foundation is to prevent and cure breast cancer by funding the most promising medical research worldwide. By investing 91 cents of every dollar to our mission, BCRF stands today as the largest and most highly rated global funder of breast cancer research.

powerpointdatavisualization_chartingtech.human_name: PowerPoint Data Visualization: Charting Techniques for Business Excellence
powerpointdatavisualization_chartingtech.description_text:
Unlock the full power of PowerPoint as a professional data visualization tool in this structured, hands-on course. Learn to create, format, and present key chart types—line, bar, pie, area, waterfall, and combo—each taught in the context of real business needs. You’ll discover how to choose the right chart for your message, apply effective titles, and use colors and labels for clarity and impact.

Moving beyond basics, the course dives into advanced visual storytelling techniques. You'll animate charts to reveal insights step-by-step, use pictographs to represent data in a more engaging way, and integrate maps for geographical context. Each concept is supported with detailed demonstrations, practical examples, and expert strategies tailored for both Windows and Mac users.

By course end, you'll know how to design clean, persuasive visuals that communicate insights clearly and effectively. With techniques for streamlining workflow using templates and setting chart defaults, your future presentations will be consistent, efficient, and visually compelling—perfect for business professionals aiming to elevate their communication.

agilescrummasterlevel1_certificationprep.human_name: Agile Scrum Master Level 1 - Certification Prep and Mock Exams
agilescrummasterlevel1_certificationprep.description_text:
This course is designed to help you excel as an Agile Scrum Master, offering a blend of theoretical knowledge and practical application. You’ll begin with a foundational understanding of Scrum principles and frameworks, exploring roles, accountabilities, and events critical to successful Agile implementations. The course then delves into certification preparation with detailed insights into the PSM I exam and free resources to solidify your learning.

Practical demonstrations form the core of your learning journey. From scheduling Scrum events and refining product backlogs to setting the Definition of Done (DoD), you’ll gain firsthand experience with essential Agile practices. Advanced sections introduce you to cutting-edge AI applications for process automation, team collaboration, and innovative product development. By incorporating software tools like Asana and leveraging interactive mock exams, this course ensures you’re thoroughly prepared for real-world challenges.

With expert instruction and engaging resources, you’ll develop not just technical proficiency but also strategic insights to lead your team effectively. Whether using AI to streamline workflows or applying empiricism to drive innovation, this course equips you to thrive in dynamic Agile environments and advance your career confidently.

essentialleadershipandmanagementtraining.human_name: Essential Leadership & Management Training for New Tech Managers
essentialleadershipandmanagementtraining.description_text:
Stepping into a tech management role is exciting but demanding. This course gives new managers a structured roadmap to build core knowledge, shift mindsets, and understand modern leadership. You'll explore your responsibilities, make a strong first impression, and master the first 100 days with confidence. From aligning with your manager to leading former peers, you'll be equipped for the realities of leadership.

The course then builds tactical skills—delegation, time mastery, and leadership models that boost team performance. You’ll gain insights into team facilitation, motivation, and decision-making, while learning how to influence without authority and remain technically relevant. Real-world strategies ensure you can lead diverse, cross-functional teams effectively.

Final modules focus on performance management, feedback, communication, HR essentials, and change leadership. You’ll learn how to hold impactful one-on-ones, resolve conflict, and improve team outcomes. With tools for self-awareness, growth mindset, and leadership confidence, this course is your complete guide to thriving as a new tech manager.

projectmanagementbestpracticesusingagile.human_name: Project Management Best Practices using Agile and Scrum
projectmanagementbestpracticesusingagile.description_text:
This course offers a transformative journey into the world of Agile and Scrum, tailored to project management professionals aiming to drive impactful results. Beginning with a look at common IT project failures, you'll uncover the root causes of missteps through compelling case studies. Alongside these lessons, you'll explore the core principles of Agile and Scrum, setting a strong foundation for implementing these frameworks effectively.

As you progress, you'll tackle the challenges of Agile adoption, including resistance to change, inadequate communication, and traditional leadership hurdles. Detailed change management strategies and exercises help you evaluate your organization's readiness, establish buy-in, and foster a culture of empowerment. Real-world success stories highlight the transformative power of iterative development and teamwork, giving you a roadmap for achieving similar outcomes in your projects.

The course wraps up with practical insights into modern leadership and team-building techniques. By understanding Agile’s servant leadership and applying the Shu-Ha-Ri learning framework, you’ll gain the tools needed to lead high-performing teams. With hands-on exercises like Planning Poker and Sprint Retrospectives, you'll refine your approach, ensuring every project you manage delivers measurable success.

developers.developer-name: Michael LMO, Ramon Josephus Louisa Janssen, Tomas Jackson

bcrf.description_text:
Donations to support BCRF are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The mission of the Breast Cancer Research Foundation is to prevent and cure breast cancer by funding the most promising medical research worldwide. By investing 91 cents of every dollar to our mission, BCRF stands today as the largest and most highly rated global funder of breast cancer research.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Manager's Toolkit by Packt
from_bundle.short_marketing_blurb: Lead processes and people with confidence
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Agile Release Management for Scrum and Kanban Teams, Agile Scrum Master Level 1 - Certification Prep and Mock Exams, Essential Leadership & Management Training for New Tech Managers, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Pay what you want to take your career to the next level and become a leader of people and processes with the Manager’s Toolkit Bundle. Master fundamental systems like Microsoft 365, or even take on new responsibilities as a scrum master with personalized lesson plans like Microsoft Excel 365 – Beginner to Advanced, The AI-Enhanced Scrum Master – Automate, Analyse, and Accelerate Agile Workflow, and more. Strengthen your leadership skills and learn how to get the most out of your team today!
from_bundle.author: Packt

basic_data.human_name: Kalypso Strategy and Tactics Pack 2025
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb:
Test your tactics and strategy with this awesome bundle of brain-teasing games from Kalypso Media! Prepare for the ultimate Disciples: Liberation experience, including the Paths to Madness expansion. The Disciples series is a fan-favorite dark fantasy strategy RPG featuring turn-based combat, rich lore, and mature themes—and the additional content only deepens the mystery of the lands of Nevendaar. Or put your decision-making skills to the test with the electrifying, addictive wartime RTS Commandos 3 - HD Remaster. Play these great games from Kalypso Media and help support One Tree Planted with your purchase!

Keys expire. Please redeem your key before January 16th. 2027.
basic_data.description:
Let’s get tactical. Test your tactics and strategy with this awesome bundle of brain-teasing games from Kalypso Media! Prepare for the ultimate Disciples: Liberation experience, including the Paths to Madness expansion. The Disciples series is a fan-favorite dark fantasy strategy RPG featuring turn-based combat, rich lore, and mature themes—and the additional content only deepens the mystery of the lands of Nevendaar. Or put your decision-making skills to the test with the electrifying, addictive wartime RTS Commandos 3 - HD Remaster. Play these great games from Kalypso Media and help support One Tree Planted with your purchase!

Pay $7 or more. Normally, the total cost for the games in this bundle is as much as $330. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $7 purchase. Pay $7 or more to access Steam keys.

Redeem on Steam. All of the games in this bundle are available on Steam for Windows — and some for Mac and Linux too. Please check out the full system requirements here prior to purchasing.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support One Tree Planted. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

dungeons3-lordofthekings.callout: 3 Campaign maps, 3 new evil hubs, & new boss enemy: King Arcturus
dungeons3-lordofthekings.description_text:
The great King Arcturus returns from his quest with the Holy Grail in tow, only to find out that someone has devastated his city of Stormbreeze (and the rest of the kingdom). He immediately set about recapturing the lands, but he hadn’t reckoned with the Always-Has-The-Last-Laugh Evil.
Although the player initially helps King Arcturus, they soon return to side of Evil where, with the help of some converted heroes, they wipe the floor with him.

dungeons-intothedark.description_text:
The first DLC pack for the critically acclaimed evildoer game Dungeons delivers new challenges for wannabe dungeon lords. Heart Into the Dark is the new campaign map Flowerdale, in which players have to deal with with ever new waves of heroes. The pack also includes ten new maps for the game modes survival, soul survival, sandbox and amusement and twenty new prestige items.


Key Features:
  • Twenty new prestige items
  • New campaign map Flowerdale
  • Ten new maps for sandbox, survival, soul survival and amusement

dungeons3_amultitudeofmaps.callout: Three new Skirmish Maps with new challenges for single player or co-op mode
dungeons3_amultitudeofmaps.description_text:
It’s time to put on the oversized boots of the Absolute Evil one last time to fight the particularly dull forces of Good on three unique skirmish maps. Show your opponents you know how to smash skulls with a warhammer and demonstrate your skills in harmonious strife to your worst friends and favourite enemies alike.

In this Map Pack, you fight alongside Thalya for the Summoning Stones, offer sacrificial victims on the slopes of Mortuary Mountain and help a Grave Golem in his search for a new resting place.

- Includes three completely new Skirmish Maps with new challenges for the Sublime Evil: The Summoning Stones, Corpses for the Mortuary Mountain and Re-burying the Golem

- All three maps are available in single player or together with friends in co-op mode

dungeons.callout:
Create the dungeon of your dreams and defeat heroes to become one & only Dungeon Lord

ProtonDB Bronze Deck Support
dungeons.description_text:
A mighty hero stalks through a dark, dank dungeon making life miserable for hordes of pitiable monsters as he steals anything and everything not bolted to the floor. Been there, done that - about a thousand times? Then it is definitely time to switch sides and show that hero just who's who in the dungeon!

Assume the role of a mighty (and mighty evil) Dungeon Lord and create your own diabolical demesnes underground. Dim-witted goblin workers tremble as they await your orders and dig corridors and rooms into the rock at your command.
Heroes will visit your dungeon in search of battle and treasure.

Naturally, you could always just annihilate them with a snap of your fingers. But isn't it more entertaining and deliciously evil to watch them attain their heart's desire - and then take take it ALL away?
So throw them a few treasures and some equipment, give them a couple of fights for entertainment and cherish and look after them. And once they are finally happy enough - it's time for the "harvest". For happy heroes have more valuable soul energy for you to gleefully extract from them in your prison or torture chamber!

But even though these self-proclaimed warriors for the good are not much more than an excellent source of resources for you, you still should not underestimate them. If you've beaten up too many of their friends, the powerful and vindictive Champions will occasionally make their way to your Dungeon. Perhaps a small sum could persuade them to forget their moral and ethical principles for once?
In addition to the heroes, you should also always keep an wary eye on the underground. For the competition never sleeps, and other Dungeon Lords would like to claim your territory for themselves. As if that were not enough, another Dungeon Lord lives one level below you who, to top it all off, is also your boss and bombards you with useless tasks! Of course, it goes without saying that malicious and sneaky beings such as yourself are already hard at work trying to take his place!

Story

The game revolves around Deimos, foremost of all Dungeon Lords. He falls victim to a devious plot hatched by his vile, nasty, thoroughly vicious ex-girlfriend Calypso, and suddenly finds himself at the bottom of the hierarchy and the top of the dungeon once again.

As the story proceeds Deimos tries to regain his old place and have his well-deserved revenge on Calypso. First, however, he will have to deal with his new bosses. On the one hand , there's the Zombie King, who is about as intelligent as your average undead zombie is likely to be, and on the other there's hot-blooded Minos, who likes to solve problems using violence or, alternatively, more violence.

Key features:
  • Be insidious! Three different Boss Monsters await in order to give you a real hard time. Get rid of them to become the one and only Dungeon Lord!
  • Get ready for a fight! 10 different classes of heroes dare to enter your dungeon where 15 different monsters lurk in the dark
  • The 17 campaign missions demand your whole cunningness as evil dungeon lord. If you manage to survive them there's still the custom game waiting for you.
  • In a dungeons there's only one way: going down. 3 different levels wait to be conquered by you.
  • Prison cells and torture chambers are ready for your command and await “customers”
  • Create the dungeon of your dreams with 50 different objects
  • Wimpy goblin workers await your commands and create the dungeon after your wishes.

dungeons2_agameofwinter.description_text:
Young Barthas Snow of the Northwatch goes forth to search for his lost uncle Banjo beyond the great wall. A difficult journey lies before him, on which he unwittingly awakens an unimaginable evil from a long dead era...
In the major extension A Game of Winter, hordes of undead overrun Dungeons 2 – and not only are they accompanied by the foul stench of blood and decay, they also come equipped with a completely new, fully scored and voice acted campaign with eight maggot-ridden missions! As the Commander of the brainless army, you control 13 gruesome new units, including brain-devouring zombies, bone-crunching skeletons and sorcerous vampires, and gain eight new rooms for your dungeon to do with as you please, such as the cemetery, the laboratory and the final resting place. You can now also take command of the undead in multiplayer games!

Features:

  • New faction: The brainless army brings a new, undead breath of air to the Dungeons 2 universe.
  • New tasks: A completely new and fully scored and voice acted campaign with 8 extensive missions awaits you.
  • New subjects: Command 13 new units, including zombies and vampires.
  • New rooms: Build 8 new rooms, like the cemetery and the laboratory.
  • New maps: 8 new brand new sandbox maps.
  • New in multiplayer: The undead can be relied upon to spread evil and wreak havoc in battle against your multiplayer adversaries!

dungeons3-evilofthecaribbean.callout: New campaign across 3 maps, 3 new evil hubs, & new outfit: Thalya the pirate
dungeons3-evilofthecaribbean.description_text: After her numerous adventures, Thalya has earned herself some peace and quiet, and so the Never-Gives-Subordinates-Vacation Evil sends her to the pirate holiday paradise of Turtoga. However, it still has a few teeny tiny tasks for its general, such as rum running, still not paying off gambling debts and dealing with creatures from the depths of the ocean (Cthollho or something like that).

suddenstrikegold.callout: Contains Sudden Strike Forever add-on & Total War map pack
suddenstrikegold.description_text:
Set in World War 2, Sudden Strike offers revolutionary real-time-strategy gameplay. Command Russian, German, French, American and British armies in large scale battles including urban warfare, beach landings and aerial invasions. Whichever tactics you choose, you will find it in Sudden Strike!

Features

  • Up to 1000 units per scenario including historically accurate tanks, artillery, infantry and aircraft
  • Gigantic maps offer unparalleled strategic depth and tactical choices
  • Destructable terrain, bridges, houses, fortifications and trees
  • Build fortifications and pontoon bridges
  • Contains the original RTS classic "Sudden Strike", "Sudden Strike Forever" add-on and "Total War" map pack
  • Contains map editor

commandos_behindenemylines.callout:
89% Positive on Steam

A bundle in a bundle, from the Commandos Collection!
commandos_behindenemylines.description_text:
Commandos: Behind Enemy Lines is a real-time tactics game set in World War II that puts you in command of a small squad of elite troopers. Send them behind enemy lines on a series of hazardous missions, and bring them back alive. Clever strategy has never been so furiously action-packed. Study the enemy's movements, develop a careful plan, synchronize your men, and launch them on a swift and fierce attack using all your power and skill.

  • You control 6 individual commandos each with a unique combat skill set.
  • Thwart the German war machine by means of sabotage and tactical genius.
  • Zoomable isometric camera allows for up to 6 simultaneous camera angles.
  • 20 missions throughout Europe and Northern Africa.
  • Co-op multiplayer mode on a LAN or over the internet.

dungeons3-famouslastwords.callout: New campaign across 3 maps, New boss enemy: The Narrator, New creep type: Pen Pushers
dungeons3-famouslastwords.description_text:
“The Spirit of the Absolute Evil will run forever.”

Evil, evil everywhere, and there’s absolutely nothing Good left to conquer. No paladins, queens nor goddesses could stop the evil army’s triumphal march, and it will still be a while until the next generation of heroes will be come of age. So now, it’s time for the Finally-Bored-To-Death Evil to hang up its armour. But it wouldn’t be Dungeons if it didn’t end with the biggest of all bangs.

While the Absolute Evil is making an excursion into the as-yet unconquered depths of its own nose – out of pure boredom, obviously – a very heated discussion between Thalya and our beloved narrator erupts. Who will emerge victorious when these two luminous figures wrestle it out to become the ultimate warrior on the battlefield of evil? It’s time to find out…

dungeons2_asongofsandandfire.human_name: Dungeons 2 - A Song of Sand and Fire
dungeons2_asongofsandandfire.callout: Adds 3 New Combat missions for 10 hours of gameplay
dungeons2_asongofsandandfire.description_text:
On a tour of the world of Dungeons 2 , the Widely-Traveled Evil finds itself in a scorching desert in the blazing new DLC "A Song of Sand and Fire" . An insane priestess is on the loose, burning anything not back in its' dungeon by the count of three at the stake. Will the Flammable Evil and its' minions also fall victim to the flames? Or will the Callous Evil be able to survive this ordeal and save itself and its' minions from a charcoal-broiled end?

Features:
- 3 hot new combat missions with a total of about 10 hours of play!
- Fiery new opponent variants with their own special abilities!

dungeons3-anunexpecteddlc.callout: New campaign across 3 maps, New boss enemy: The Queen of the Forest, New creep type: Rootling
dungeons3-anunexpecteddlc.description_text:
A wild DLC appeared! The disgustingly good heroes used PANIC, RUN FOR YOUR LIVES! It’s super effective!

After the Absolute Evil’s continuous triumphs and his ultimate pwning of the Goddess of Light, the remaining little insec…er…heroes, have found shelter in the depths of the Queen of the Forest’s evergreen woods. In fact, this so-called Queen truly dares to oppose the Unconscionable-And-Defacing-Nature Evil. It’s time to clear woodland – Timbeeeeer!

dungeons-mappack.callout: New campaign map Flowerdale + Ten new maps for additional game modes
dungeons-mappack.description_text: The second DLC pack for the critically acclaimed evildoer game Dungeons delivers 50 new maps and 5 new wallpapers.

disciples_liberation.callout:
Build a base, Recruit 50+ units, challenge bosses in 80+ hour campaign or 2-player online skirmishes

Deck Verified
disciples_liberation.description_text:
Disciples: Liberation is a mature, dark fantasy strategy RPG with turn-based combat. Liberate the land of Nevendaar and uncover the endless stories hidden within this richly detailed world where every decision has a consequence, and every wrong move could be deadly.

Explore a rich overworld and align with a variety of in-world factions: from a human empire tinged by religious extremism to the dark forces of the undead lead by a mad queen. Assemble a team to gather precious resources, sway political standing, and take on brutal beasts in intricate turn-based battles.

Choice is everything in Disciples: Liberation and it is up to you how you write your story.

FEATURE LIST

  • 80+ hour single-player campaign: experience a sprawling dark fantasy epic over three acts, with more than 270 quests and objectives, and five unique endings to unlock

  • Explore a war-torn realm: journey through a sprawling world in ruin and work to unearth its endless secrets, hidden treasures, and bloody past

  • Write your own story: pick from four uniquely skilled classes and define your place in the world, recruiting others to your cause from an assortment of factions

  • Build a base: take on quests for precious resources and use your political savvy to build a place of planning and sanctuary

  • Fight for your life: recruit 50+ units and amass an army best suited to your play style; hone both steel and spell in intricate-turned based combat.

  • Challenge deadly bosses: test your mettle and pit your party against horrific monsters and beasts, each requiring a unique strategy

  • Choice is everything: let your decisions guide your fate and directly influence what sort of leader you become

  • Fight your friends: put forth the ultimate challenge and battle for supremacy in 2-player online skirmishes

dungeons2_achanceofdragons.callout: Includes 3 New Skirmish Missions & new enemies such as mages & dragons
dungeons2_achanceofdragons.description_text:
In ‘A Chance of Dragons’ devious dragons are infiltrating the world of Dungeons 2. In three all-new skirmish missions, you must do everything in your power to defeat the threat from dragons entrenched in the depths of an old castle who guard an ancient treasure of immense value. Hunt for magical dragon eggs, go up against powerful mages and test your skills against the ultimate dragon of unmeasurable power. With over 10 hours of gameplay across three fiery missions, ‘A Chance of Dragons brings a whole new set of challenges for even the most seasoned Dungeon Lords.

Features:
  • Three thrilling and challenging new skirmish scenarios with over 10 hours of combined gameplay
  • Face off against new enemies such as powerful mages and terrifying dragons

suddenstrike2gold.callout: Contains Resource War add-on & Total Victory map pack
suddenstrike2gold.description_text:
At the height of World War 2, take command of German, Russian, British, American and Imperial Japanese armies on battelfields across the globe. Sudden Strike 2 expands on all aspects of the classic RTS game with new units, maps and epic campaigns.

Features

  • 5 epic campaigns and a new combat theater: The Pacific!
  • Massive battleships, landing craft and trains
  • Command airfields and deploy aircraft
  • Mechanized units now have individual crews to command
  • Dynamic weather system
  • Contains "Sudden Strike 2", "Resource War" add-on and "Total Victory" map pack
  • Contains map editor for user-generated maps and missions

commandos3-hdremaster.callout:
Six Daredevil Commandos. Iconic WWII campaigns & Multiplayer modes for up to 8

Deck Verified
commandos3-hdremaster.description_text:
Remastered in high definition: includes reworked 3D models and textures built from the ground up, improved controls, refined UI and beginner-friendly tutorials and hints

Lead 6 daredevil Commandos: the special units under your command, from the Green Beret, Sapper, Sniper, Diver, Spy and Thief, are experts in their field and crucial to the success of your mission

Relive iconic WWII campaigns: from training camp to 12 daring missions, experience history across 3 major frontlines including Stalingrad, Central Europe and Normandy

Story and action-driven missions: follow a crack team of commandos in a time of great peril, Commandos 3 HD – Remaster includes even more detail and action than its predecessors

Rally your troops for multiplayer: compete in ‘Deathmatch’ or ‘Collect the Flag’ modes for 2-8 players, all with distinct victory conditions

Fall in, soldier! Commandos 3 - HD Remaster sends you to the relentless and unforgiving battlefields of Europe. Fight your way through the deadly trenches of Stalingrad, defeat the German enemy in the fanatical heart of the Third Reich in Berlin, and use your tactical know-how to survive the storming of Normandy on D-Day.

In this revamped third instalment of the acclaimed real-time tactics series, lead a notorious special forces unit deep behind enemy lines during World War II. Help the Allies to victory in high definition, with improved controls and user interface.

dungeons4_30offcoupon.description_text:
Get 30% off Dungeons 4 in the Humble Store!

NOTE: Expires January 30th, 2026, 6pm PST. Does not stack with Humble Store sales.

Once upon a time in a realm far, far away, everything was lush and green. The unicorns mingled among the trees and the elves and humans lived peacefully in harmony with their surroundings. Yet somewhere at the edge of a clearing half-hidden among the trees, obscured by a rising veil of fog in the hazy half-darkness of a weather-beaten hut, a shape huddles over a large and ominously glowing crystal ball. A mumbling voice sings ancient formulae, urging the swirling glowing mists inside the crystal to part and give an insight into the future.

“All is in flux, nothing seems certain. Come, oh vagaries of space and time, separate the veil and show us what is yet to come”, the voice grumbles with the hint of an eye faintly reflecting the glow in front of its hood. The shape’s audience, only barely visible in the dim light, leans in closer and listens intently. “Time ebbs and flows, forming pools and wrinkles… but when the mists part only vague images rise from beyond the veil. Shhhh—don’t come too close, you don’t want to disturb my delicate magical weavings do you?” The shape, still bent over the orb, mutters and shoos the other back a bit more into the shadows. “Ah, now it seems to be clearing a little. I can see… something… several somethings, hints of voices echoing in the haze. A baby, something happening on Hill Doom and the coming together of the Council of Snots – what could all this mean?”

In a flash, the light reflected in the eye turns red and a distant evil laughter echoes through the woods. Stay tuned for the return of the Soothsaying Evil!

The Absolute Evil and its trusted *cough* servant, the Dark Elf Thalya, return in Dungeons 4 after the events of its fabulous predecessor to bring about their triumph over the forces of good once more.

Build a cozy and comfortable Dungeon to suit your creatures’ needs and rule over them, then send them out into the Overworld to kindly remind the good people living there that the Absolute Evil rules over their lands. Gather your Evilness in new and dynamic ways and unleash it upon the lush green forests and plains of the Overworld to turn them over to the dark side. But make sure that your Dungeon is well-secured by traps and defended by your creatures, for those pesky Overworlders won’t just twiddle their thumbs while you turn their land into the Absolute Evil’s most pleasurable holiday paradise .

But what is that noise? “Gold, gold, gold and gems, gold and gems and gold!” The ancient song echoes throughout the underworld, accompanied by the clanging steel of hammers and axes. The Dwarves have arrived to claim their share of the abundant resources and together with the Elves and Humans of the Overworld, they send out their raiding parties to find the Dungeon’s heart.

Dungeons 4 keeps the spirit of its predecessor, but everything is now bigger, better, and with even more dynamic Evilness™ .

disciples_liberation-pathstomadness.callout:
DLC for Disciples: liIberation. Adds 8 new story paths, 4 new dungeons, 4 new units (including the Daughter of Sin and Living Armor), and 4 legendary relics

Keys temporarily exhausted.
disciples_liberation-pathstomadness.description_text:
Are you brave enough to tread the path of madness? Follow Avyanna in Disciples: Liberation – Paths to Madness , a new adventure to liberate the people of Nevendaar and bring them new hope. New abysses, dungeons and quests with hidden secrets and lost treasures await you. Encounter mysterious creatures and capture long-forgotten weapons that are the subjects of countless legends…and that might just give you a crucial advantage in the battle for your freedom.

Your journey leads you to the laboratory of a mad necromancer and you uncover the secret workshop of the Veil. Witness obscure rituals in the twilight and discover a bloody secret of the feral elves. At the end of each path there is a legendary reward waiting for you to wield them in battle once more.

With Disciples: Liberation – Paths to Madness, you will be able to unlock new units on your journey through Nevendaar. Meet the devious Daughter of Sin, who was once was expelled from the Legions of the Damned and is known for her diligence and cruelty alike. The Living Armor, a blend of steel and magic forged into the perfect fighting machine, emerges from the Empire's experimental chambers to help you hold your ground. Cut from a completely different cloth are the Blood Ents, who feed on the lifeblood of pure Elven bloodlines to wreck their enemies with deadly thorns. The Avatar of Death emerged directly from the abysmal brain of a mad necromancer of the Undead Horde, sowing destruction and reaping death.

Features

  • New paths: Disciples: Liberation – Paths to Madness carves new ways that can be accessed at any time in the game – even with pre-existing playthroughs. And whether you have just set out on your journey or have already forged ahead, these paths will adapt their challenge to your character level.

  • Eight new stories: Dark side quests spark new storylines with new characters and challenges.

  • Four strong allies and powerful enemies: Strengthen your army with the Daughter of Sin, the Living Armor, the Blood Ent and the Avatar of Death. After unlocking, the new units can be recruited both in the main game and in the multiplayer.

  • Four new dungeons are waiting to be explored: Dungeons full of mysteries and secrets lie hidden the far-flung corners of Nevendaar – the laboratory of a mad necromancer, a forge that turns out to be a secret workshop of the Veil, a place brimming with magic in a demonic fortress and a sacred grove of the Elven Alliance hidden among the mountain peaks.

  • Four lost and legendary relics: The Rod of the Baroness, the Scepter of the Archangel, the Staff of the Lich Queen, and the Dragon Blade of Illumielle are waiting to taste blood once again.

immortalrealms_vampirewars.callout:
Combines empire management & Turn-based combat with unique card-game elements

Deck Playable
immortalrealms_vampirewars.description_text:
Feature List

The Truth Unfolds: Discover the secrets of Nemire, and experience an enthralling story spanning across 12 meticulously crafted missions and four unique environments, from the perspective of four mighty vampire lords, each with their own goals and agendas.

Discover the Bloodlines: Command one of three unique vampire clans with distinctive units, powers, gameplay mechanics and characters. Play as the bloodthirsty Dracul, the ancient Nosfernus or the mystical Moroia!

Vampiric powers: Original card game elements enhance the gameplay and provide a refreshing take on the genre. Each clan and vampire lord has access to their own set of cards, which can be synergized into powerful combinations.

Strategy & Tactics: Command your armies, recruit new units and unlock crucial technologies in the strategic Kingdom mode, and then put your tactical skills to the test in the action-packed Combat mode.

Varied Content: Choose from three different gameplay modes, such as the story-driven Campaign, the open-world Sandbox, and the hard-fought Skirmish mode.

Summary>For as long as historians can remember, the ancient Dracul bloodline has ruled over the mysterious lands of Warmont – Realm of the Bloodthrone. Inside the secluded borders of this land, an unholy court of vampires feast on the blood of their human subjects. And, as long as they give it willingly, a vicious peace between mortal and immortal is kept alive under the watchful eye of the vampiric rulers - Vlad and Cecilia Dracul, forever bound by eternal love.
